Bash(git -C "/Users/maxshillam/Documents/Documents - Max''s MacBook Pro/GitHub/ignite-education" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix card position shifting on hover with absolute positioning

- Restructured course cards to prevent layout shift when hovering
- Outer container maintains fixed 280px  280px size in flex layout
- Added absolutely positioned inner wrapper that receives scale transform
- Transform now scales visual content without affecting grid calculations
- Blur filter remains on outer container for proper effect
- Fixes issue where hovering edge cards would shift all other cards

Technical approach:
- Outer div: Fixed size, relative positioning, holds blur filter
- Inner div: Absolutely positioned (inset-0), receives scale transform
- Scale transform no longer affects flex layout calculations

EOF
